function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Low level of control functionalities in the majority of domains","Impact":"Increased risk of manual intervention and control errors, leading to potential system inefficiencies and increased energy consumption.","Mitigation":"Implement advanced control functionalities and automation systems to optimize energy usage and reduce the reliance on manual control.","Technologies":"Building automation and control systems (BACS), advanced sensors, automation software, machine learning algorithms.","People":"Building occupants, maintenance staff, energy managers.","Owner":"Facility management, energy management team, building automation experts."},{"Description":"Building lighting control is absent","Impact":"Inadequate lighting control may lead to discomfort, reduced productivity, and increased energy usage.","Mitigation":"Install smart lighting control systems with occupancy and daylight sensors to optimize lighting usage and reduce energy waste.","Technologies":"Smart lighting controls, occupancy sensors, daylight harvesting systems, automation software.","People":"Building occupants, facility management, maintenance staff.","Owner":"Facility management, building automation experts, lighting designers."},{"Description":"No daylight or motion sensors implemented in rooms","Impact":"Lack of daylight and motion sensors hinders energy-efficient lighting and occupant comfort, leading to potential waste of energy and discomfort.","Mitigation":"Deploy advanced sensors and controls to optimize lighting based on occupancy and natural light availability, reducing energy waste and ensuring occupant well-being.","Technologies":"Occupancy sensors, daylight harvesting systems, smart lighting controls, automation software.","People":"Building occupants, facility management, energy managers.","Owner":"Facility management, building automation experts, energy management team."}]}
